title: Christmas Countdown Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Christmas Countdown plugin - displays countdown to Christmas with tree logo

enabled.description: Enable or disable the Christmas countdown plugin

display_duration.description: How long to display the countdown in seconds

live_priority.description: Enable live priority takeover when plugin has live content

high_performance_transitions.description: Use high-performance transitions (120 FPS) instead of standard (30 FPS)

update_interval.description: How often to update the countdown in seconds (default: 1 hour, since countdown changes daily)

text_color.description: RGB color for the countdown text [R, G, B] (default: red)

tree_color.description: RGB color for the Christmas tree [R, G, B] (default: green). Only used if tree image is not available.

tree_size.description: Size of the Christmas tree logo in pixels. If not specified, size is auto-calculated based on display height.
